value.0:
Rubbing this stinky green paste into wounds, and rapidly wrapping the wounds with bandages, promotes rapid healing. This requires two people to see to a wound; one to apply the paste and the other to quickly apply the bandages before the substance hardens and forms a brittle layer. 

Applying the salve is a full-round action. One dose cures 1d8 points of damage to a living creature. Only one dose may be applied per round, and there is no limit on how many salves can be applied over time.
